page.title: For Our Students, For Cincinnati's Future
page.description: How To Guide: 3 Ways to Invest in a student's education to shape Cincinnati's future.

intro.paragraphs:
With 50,000 students and a rapidly changing world, UC is accelerating our work to ensure each student succeeds.

Why? Because we know that a college degree is the best tool for generational change. And a UC degree is the best path to launch a career of meaning and impact.

Under a broad, university-wide vision, we are creating new scholarships and recruitment programs, adding student-centered resources, and elevating career readiness tools to empower the next generation of leaders.

items.text: An opportunity for every student who wants to earn a UC degree, free from financial barriers.
A community where each Bearcat feels like they belong—and has the tools to thrive.
A path to success that sets UC apart as the launching place for tomorrow's leaders and change-makers.
1,500 University Honors students across nine colleges.

boldRedText: There's a story unfolding at the University of Cincinnati, and every one of us who calls Greater Cincinnati home has a stake in what happens next.
